links.title: Elon Musk's 'Rick and Morty' Butter Robot Shirt Is a Weird Choice
links.description: What's that strange T-shirt Elon Musk wore to the annual Tesla Shareholder meeting? Actually, it's a bit of a deep cut reference that any 'Rick and Morty' fan should recognize, but because it's essentially the symbol of despair for the show, it's kind of a weird choice.

messages.body: $TSLA Tesla's Energy Storage Business Is Surging https://finance.yahoo.com/news/tesla-apos-energy-storage-business-013300917.html

links.title: Tesla's Energy Storage Business Is Surging
links.description: Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) CEO Elon Musk's update on the electric-car maker's business on Tuesday afternoon at the company's annual shareholder meeting obviously impressed investors. The stock surged higher on Wednesday, finishing the trading day up nearly 10%. For the most part, headlines after the meeting seemed focused on Musk confirming that the automaker is on track with its production and profitability plans.
